duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage healthcare/medical office assets within the real estate private equity firm.
Acquire and evaluate senior living, healthcare, and senior housing assets.
Utilize strong Excel modeling skills and knowledge of ARGUS Enterprise for financial analysis and reporting.
Communicate effectively with internal and external stakeholders.
Collaborate with the leadership team to drive strategic asset management decisions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Business, Economics, Finance, Real Estate, or Accounting (Master's preferred)
